page.title: 09SCHOOLS, FAIRLIGHT E. SUSSEX
page.content:
There are two schools in the Fairlight, Guestling, Pett area of East Sussex. They are Guestling-Bradshaw County Primary and Hillcrest Comprehensive Schools.
The school year is divided into three terms of about eleven weeks in length. The year starts at the beginning of September and ends about the middle of December. The second term lasts from January to Easter, and the third term goes from Easter to the third week of July.
The school day at Guestling-Bradshaw goes from 8.55am to 3.30pm. The school takes children from the age of 4\ to ll\ years, both boys and girls. Most of the children stay at school for a school lunch or to eat their sandwiches as they live so far away.
